website_summaries.verdict: Compact bifold design with enough slots to accommodate a modest card collection.
pros: Adorable wallet that is versatile enough for everyday use
Comes in a variety of colors and designs
Includes an ID window and 2 extra pockets
RFID-blocking technology keeps your information safe
cons: Due to its small size, some found it challenging to stuff all their cash inside

customer_reviews.title: Not really usable
customer_reviews.text: It was cute, I wanted to fall in love but it was too small, too poorly made to work out. The space for bills is too short so all of the bills get folded meaning you can't put much in there. The card slots are sized ok but there seems to be something that grabs the cards when trying to pull them out, glue or something so that's a hassle. In short I'm wishing I had not made thia purchase. Back to the old fossil wallet.
customer_reviews.author: H. Jones

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect wallet for the purpose
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a small wallet that I can keep cards, bills, and coins for a long time. This is the perfect wallet for the purpose. It is not bulky, so it fits anywhere. Also, you can keep bills and coins. A lot of small wallets usually don't have the feature. Also, the material is really nice, and it doesn't look cheap at all. But if you have to keep more than 10 cards, it might not be the best for you. Probably 8-10 is maximum. I found it at koehl's, but it turned out it is way cheaper in Amazon. So I returned it to Koehl's and purchased it here. I am so happy! : )
customer_reviews.author: Frida

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality material
customer_reviews.text: The design is great, but material quality is very disappointing. The front pocket is actually a false pocket, so very little space. Good for kids to play with, but not practical for adults.
customer_reviews.author: milenski

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: The pattern is well designed, Fossil quality. The Relic wallet is not as well made as Fossil, not leather, cloth on the inside is cheaper quality. That said, this is a well designed functional item that has a great look. Well done Fossil for making this affordable line.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Cute, small, fits cash, snap works well
customer_reviews.text: The cactus design is adorable. I was concerned that the snap wouldn't hold it shut when it was full of my cards and cash, but no problem so far. I've had fossil wallets for years and years and love their products.
customer_reviews.author: Toobizzee

customer_reviews.title: cute little wallet
customer_reviews.text: I love this cute little wallet. I've been searching for a while for a small women's wallet and this one works great; room for a few cards and cash. Also the little birds are adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea P Weymouth

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: I have had one just like this one for years. Really liked it. Recently the snap broke. I wanted another just like it. Am happy with purchase except as another buyer mentioned the inside of the wallet did not match the picture. The picture was exactly like the one I had for years. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Family of 4

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little wallet
customer_reviews.text: I use this as my travel wallet as there aren't many credit card slots but perfect for light travel.
customer_reviews.author: R.L7968

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wallet! The cards can be put in and taken out without feeling tight and the wallet is pretty soft. It is a bit bigger than I’d like, but it isn’t an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Holds the 6 cards I need to carry on me all the time. Small and compact which I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling Archer

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet.
customer_reviews.text: Loved color. Compact wallet. One dislike is that the dollars don’t slide in and out easily.
customer_reviews.author: T Kray

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Wallet
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is beautiful! I get compliment constantly. It wears well. Still looks new and I use it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good simple sturdy wallet
customer_reviews.text: Securely holds cards, but can sometimes make taking a card out a bit difficult. Still love mine though.
customer_reviews.author: SoCali

customer_reviews.title: Great item for great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallet, just the right size of wallet. And the design is beautiful! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Genesis

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little wallet! It's so adorable and holds way more than you would expect.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hite

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and a fun little wallet that you can throw in you back pocket or jacket pocket. Has 5 card slots bill slot and ID holder with a small change pouch on back side. This is my second of these little wallets that I’ve owned.
customer_reviews.author: Stacia Giles

customer_reviews.title: Bought for friend.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for German friend. She loves Arizona and now wallet!
customer_reviews.author: David L. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Little darker of a color than expected, but super cute and convenient to use ❤️
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Small and perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love the wallet. Small enough to fit in my back jeans pocket when I don't want to carry my purse. The wallet is just as described, cute, small and sturdy. I like it so much I purchased a couple others in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: A West

customer_reviews.title: Cute but poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: 3 days over the return window and the flower ripped off the front. Cute tho.
customer_reviews.author: Achraely

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is perfect! You can fit cash, change, several credit cards. It's nice and sturdy and easy to put in your pocket to run into the store. LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.author: lonni

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: ZERO STARS! The black wallet was pictured having a tan/saddle dotted fabric interior. The one we received was solid black interior. Daughter hates it, says it looks like a man's wallet....I agree. Disappointed! Returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that after 3 months, the button popped off. Wallet is no longer useable.
customer_reviews.author: lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Easily fits in a pocket!
customer_reviews.text: I put my important "stuff" in this wallet to shop, and don't have to carry a purse. It's pretty and it's rugged.
customer_reviews.author: karen davignon

customer_reviews.title: It falls apart after 5 minutes of receiving
customer_reviews.text: I just got it and it’s coming apart. The stitching started to come undone. Very disappointed. Wasn’t expecting that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a small purse. Very well made. So cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Cute
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is great for every day, its small and everything is super easy to access.
customer_reviews.author: Layla Evens

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is perfect, Just a little to big for my wrist-let.
customer_reviews.author: BBR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It great it the right size to fit anywhere. I would like to another one for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Neat wallet
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is my favorite by far. Room for cash, card slots, and even a pocket for coins. All that stuff and yet the wallet is still very neat, and minimalistic.
customer_reviews.author: Nhi Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: 2 years going strong!
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this wallet! It has lasted me so far 2 years and it does not look used at all. The size is amazing because women pockets are not big but this wallet can fit in my back pocket and it is amazing! One down side is, it doesn't fit a lot of things in it. The cash does not fit unless it is folded but that is not that big of a deal for me. I would highly suggest this wallet! Also I got the blue one and it doesn't even have a scratch on it.
customer_reviews.author: ReddingReader

product_meta.title: Relic by Fossil RFID Blocking Bifold Wallet
feature_bullets: This Relic by Fossil wallet helps protect your information from unwarranted scanning.
Interior: 2 card slots, ID window, 2 slip pockets & cash pocket
Special lining shields the Radio Frequency Identification (RFID) chips on credit & debit cards from being scanned when the wallet is properly closed
